front.title: Configuration Hints for Common Mail User Agents

abstract.t: This informational document describes how certain common Mail User Agents can be configured for conformance with the IETF Mailing List Guidelines. Subject to normal processes and procedures, this draft might some day be published as an Informational RFC. [NOTE: Any comments should be sent to the document editor as email, strongly preferably with a clear Subject: line indicating this draft is the topic. Comments with specific proposed edits are much more helpful than broad general comments.]
